title: Merman
description: Aquatic humanoids with fish tails in place of legs. Live in coastal waters, farming seaweed and hunting fish.
extras: Weapons: Spears, tridents, or daggers.	Leaders: For every 10 in a group, there is a 2HD leader. For every 50, there is a 4HD leader (saves: D10 W11 P12 B13 S14 (4)).	Underwater villages: Home to 1d3 × 100 individuals.	Guardians: Use trained sea creatures or monsters to guard their homes.
